title: Saudi Arabia: Ministry of Hajj and Umrah to begin issuing Hajj 2026 visas from Sunday
summary_full: Saudi Arabia has launched visa processing for the 2026 Hajj season, nearly four months ahead of schedule. This proactive measure, part of Vision 2030, aims to enhance service readiness, improve pilgrim comfort, and streamline logistics. Contracts for holy site services and Makkah accommodations are finalized, with significant pilgrim registration already underway, ensuring a more organized pilgrimage.
